channel.title: data management on Logotyp.us

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
 Veritas Technologies Logo
Veritas Technologies LLC. is an American international data management company headquartered in Santa Clara, California. The company has its origins in Tolerant Systems, founded in 1983 and later renamed Veritas Software. It specializes in storage management software including the first commercial journaling file system, VxFS, VxVM, VCS, the personal/small office backup software Backup Exec and the enterprise backup software, NetBackup. Veritas Record Now was an early CD recording software. Prior to merging with Symantec in 2004, Veritas was listed on the S&P 500 and the NASDAQ-100 under the VRTS ticker symbol.
You can download theVeritaslogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Veritas
item.description: Veritas Technologies LLC. is an American international data management company headquartered in Santa Clara, California. The company has its origins in Tolerant Systems, founded in 1983 and later renamed Veritas Software. It specializes in storage management software including the first commercial journaling file system, VxFS, VxVM, VCS, the personal/small office backup software Backup Exec and the enterprise backup software, NetBackup. Veritas Record Now was an early CD recording software. Prior to merging with Symantec in 2004, Veritas was listed on the S&P 500 and the NASDAQ-100 under the VRTS ticker symbol.
